text: You Are Free () is a 1983 West German short documentary film directed by Dea Brokman, in which five former U.S. Servicemen and a prison camp survivor provide accounts of the liberation of the Nazi concentration camps in 1945. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 documentary films Category:1983 films Category:German-language films Category:German documentary films Category:German short films Category:Short documentary films Category:West German films Category:Documentary films about the Holocaust
title: You Are Free (film)
